articles.author: Rob Hughes
articles.title: Jasper County Sheriff's Office shooting: Officer kills Hobart man Matthew W. Huttle, pardoned by Trump, IN State Police say - ABC7 Chicago
articles.description: A northwest Indiana sheriff's deputy shot and killed a 42-year-old man during a traffic stop Sunday afternoon, Indiana State Police said.
articles.content:
JASPER COUNTY, Ind. (WLS) -- A northwest Indiana sheriff's deputy shot and killed a 42-year-old man during a traffic stop Sunday afternoon, Indiana State Police said.
